name: Hunt Down The Freeman
description: Just another mission, or so you thought… until aliens from another dimension start invading Earth before a scientist with a crowbar hospitalizes you after wiping out your entire squad. Just when you thought you were finished, a man with a briefcase offers you the chance for another beginning.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 10/8/7/Vista or Greater Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Video Card or Greater Storage: 40 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Video Card or Greater Storage: 40 GB available space
